sources.title: Fighting with Kit Carson (1933) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER üçï Johhny Mack Brown
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Johnny Mack Brown, Betsy King Ross, Noah Beery
Directors: Colbert Clark & Armand Schaefer 

A wagon train led by Kit Carson is routinely attacked by Kraft and his Mystery Riders after its gold cargo. 

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:04     CHAPTER 1:  The Mystery Riders
29:56     CHAPTER 2:  The White Chief
47:57     CHAPTER 3:  Hidden Gold
1:05:51  CHAPTER 4:  The Silent Doom
1:24:01  CHAPTER 5:  Murder Will Out
1:41:21  CHAPTER 6:  The Secret of Iron Mountain
1:58:40  CHAPTER 7:  The Law of the Lawless
2:17:27  CHAPTER 8:  Red Phantoms
2:34:28  CHAPTER 9:  The Invisible Enemy
2:52:32  CHAPTER 10: Midnight Magic
3:11:39  CHAPTER 11: Unmasked
3:29:17  CHAPTER 12: The Trail To Glory
3:47:54  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: A pack train led by Kit Carson is attacked by Kraft and his Mystery Riders, who want a government shipment of gold carried by the wagons. Matt Fargo manages to hide the gold, but Carson must confront the Mystery Riders time after time in order to prevent them from finding and carrying away the treasure.
metadata.Writer: Jack Natteford, Barney A. Sarecky, Colbert Clark
metadata.Actors: Johnny Mack Brown, Betsy King Ross, Noah Beery
